Name: Derpy Dinos
About the game: Derpy Dinos is a 2.5D side-scrolling arcade shooter. Smash, throw, and blast derpy dinosaurs for sport. The more carnage you produce, the more points you earn for a spot on the global leaderboards. Protect your ship from dino lasers and volcanic debris, collect power-ups, and earn achievements by completing challenging feats. Use keyboard/mouse or an Xbox360 controller to play! Made by Brandon Rivera-Melo, Joshua Levenson, Cherlin Mao, Andrew Liu, Aaron Desin, and Nathan Rivera-Melo Special Thanks to: Joshua Beedle Jimmy Kelly
